cm:stacks:validate-regex.description: This command is used to find all the invalid regexes present in the content types and global fields of your stack.

help.name: help
help.description: To show the flags that can be used with this CLI command

alias.name: alias
alias.description: Alias (name) assigned to the management token

contentType.name: contentType
contentType.description: To find invalid regexes within the content types

globalField.name: globalField
globalField.description: To find invalid regexes within the global fields

filePath.name: filePath
filePath.description: [optional] The path or the location in your file system where the CSV output file should be stored.
